basics.label: Mortgage Banking Foreclosure Specialist
basics.summary: Ambitious, self-motivated professional with a passion for quality work. Seeking a baseline opportunity in Underwriting, Lending, Auditing, Quality Assurance, or Analyst roles. Possess large spectrum of experience in the financial industry. I am a fast learner who values my employer. Personal characteristics: detail-oriented, thorough, computer-savvy, loyal, persistent, adaptable, eager to learn.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Maintained beneath a 3% error ratio in all searches performed. Service member Civil Relief Act (SCRA).
highlights: Use of industry mainframes; (LPS, MSP, Vendorscape, Lenstar, ResWare and Lotus) to efficiently communicate with internal clients.
Review of cases and all milestones requested by clients to ensure proper procedures and industry guidelines are used.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Home Preservation. Exceeded monthly production goals while adhering to a minimum 5% error ratio.
highlights: Restructured delinquent consumer mortgage loans in accordance with company, FHA, and industry guidelines using an in house underwriting software.
Maintained quality control standards while maintaining production standards by company's definition.
Analyzed applicants' financial status, credit and property evaluation to determine feasibility of granting loan.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Mortgage Loan Operations. Maintained below a 5% error rating on booking 50+ loans daily.
highlights: Booking and review of conventional, F.H.A. & V.A. loans.
Data entry functions including booking and review of recorded security instruments.
Reviewed documentation for errors & omissions of security documents.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Mortgage Lending Services. Corresponded with customers, management, and title companies, to respond to inquiries.
highlights: Interpreted company policies while analyzing the applicant, property, and documentation to minimize the need for subsequent follow ups with borrowers.
Verified and validated supporting income, asset, and liability documentation to ensure validity.
Clears all Title exceptions and errors.
Successfully maintained a minimum volume of 30+ loan packages daily with no errors
